downloadTitle: Microsoft IT Institute Best Practice Experience: Lync at Microsoft
downloadDescription: This session covers “How Microsoft Does IT” and provides insight into how Microsoft deploys and manages Lync and conferencing solutions to support Microsoft’s 220,000+ internal users. Participants will learn the best practices Microsoft has created and employed in designing, developing, deploying, and operating Lync, and Enterprise Voice for our global environment.
detailsSection: This session covers “How Microsoft Does IT” and provides insight into how Microsoft deploys and manages Lync and conferencing solutions to support Microsoft’s 220,000+ internal users. Participants will learn the best practices Microsoft has created and employed in designing, developing, deploying, and operating Lync, and Enterprise Voice for our global environment.
